title: Wrapper for MyFantasyLeague API
text: API wrapper MyFantasyLeague Open API

title: Average Draft information — average_draft
text: ADP AAV results, including result last updated, many drafts auctions player selected average auction value average, maximum minimum pick position. Average auction value relative auction total $1000 available across franchises.

title: Average Draft information — average_draft
code: average_draft(   type = c("adp", "aav"),   period = c("ALL", "RECENT", "DRAFT", "JUNE", "JULY", "AUG1", "AUG15", "START", "MID",     "PLAYOFF"),   num_franchises = c("12", "8", "10", "14", "16"),   PPR = c("-1", "0", "1"),   keeper = c("N", "K", "R"),   mock = c("-1", "0", "1"),   cutoff = NULL,   details = NULL )

title: Average Draft information — average_draft
text: type Return average draft position (adp) average auction values (aav) period returns draft data just drafts started specified period. Valid values , RECENT, DRAFT, JUNE, JULY, AUG1, AUG15, START, MID, PLAYOFF. num_franchises returns draft data just leagues number franchises. Valid values 8, 10, 12, 14 16. value 8, returns data leagues 8 less franchises. value 16 returns data leagues 16 franchises. PPR Filters data returned follows: set 0, data leagues use PPR scoring system; set 1, PPR scoring system; set -1, leagues. keeper Pass string combination N, K R: N specified, returns data redraft leagues, 'K' specified, returns data keeper leagues 'R' specified, return data rookie-drafts. can combine . specify c('K','R') return rookie keeper drafts . Default c('N', 'K', 'R'). mock set 1, returns data mock draft leagues . set 0, excludes data mock draft leagues. set -1, returns cutoff returns data players selected least percentage drafts. pass 10, means players selected less 10 Note value less 5, results may unpredictable. details set 1, returns leagues included results.
